name: Ignore the Elephant!
description:
Navigate your way through the room while ignoring the elephant (lest you be confronted with a sensitive topic).

Made for #ThinkyPuzzleJam (Theme: Elephant in the Room)!

Had a great time learning puzzlescript for this jam!

There are 7 levels total.

---

Controls:

Z - Undo

R - Restart

X - Select / Continue Dialog
